title: Expert-Consensus-Based Curriculum for Strengthening European-Style International Mobility Competencies (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Language Communication Skills and Possession of Job-Related Professional Knowledge
context.additional_context: Focuses on developing practical, job-ready competencies for immediate application in professional settings. Enables simple resource sharing and feedback collection via smartphones.

learning_goals: Learners can utilize core vocabulary and expressions for effective communication in European international exchange environments with 80% accuracy
Learners can present at least three collaboration strategies considering cultural differences through case analysis
Learners can successfully resolve at least 70% of conflict situations that may occur in international work environments via simulation exercises
Learners can analyze Delphi method application cases and explain the expert consensus derivation process in four or more stages.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
